Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swab, or saliva
Purpose: To determine the genotype of the Catechol-O-Methyltransferase (COMT) gene for clinical or research analysis.
Container: EDTA tube, buccal swab in DNA stabilization buffer, or saliva DNA collection kit
Equipment: Thermocycler, PCR workstation, DNA extraction system, microcentrifuge, agarose gel electrophoresis system, gel documentation system
